name: Beep 'N' Zap - WIZARD GAME
description:
Psycho-x has hypnotized the local forest creatures using magik crystals. Fortunately, these can also be used as currency for purchasing the giant robot part you need for your friend's birthday. Blast through 5 unique areas with 4 staffs and a grappling hook, be sure to keep your combo up for a massive boost to score.

Heavily inspired by DJ Rozwell's "NONE OF THIS IS REAL"

Music by:

Eric - https://soundcloud.com/noawn

Noisemaker - https://noisemaster.bandcamp.com/album/mystic-of-madness-ep

DJ Rozwell - https://djrozwell.bandcamp.com/ also https://kfcmurderchicks.bandcamp.com/

Cover art by RustyToast.

Made for Beep 'N' Zap Sidequesters jam: https://itch.io/c/2569111/beep-n-zap
